translations: 经营者；操作者；[计]运算符（operator 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Tour operators may be forced to bite the bullet and cut prices.
sentences.translation: 旅游社的经营者们不得不忍痛降价。

sentences.sentence: A plethora of new operators will be allowed to enter the market.
sentences.translation: 过多的新经营者将获准进入市场。

sentences.sentence: It is about time tour operators respected the law and their own code of conduct.
sentences.translation: 现在该是旅行社经营者们遵守法律和他们自己的行业规范的时候了。
